entry.title: Med 5 - Concentrated Neutral Disinfectant (4L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: INO SOLUTIONS
Type: Surface Dsiinfectant
Price: 29.95

MED 5 Neutral Disinfectant is a 5 minutes acting disinfectant that cleans, deodorizes and cuts through tough grease and grime. This product contains no phosphates and delivers non-acid disinfectant and cleaning performance in an economical concentrate. It meets AOAC efficacy standards for hospital disinfectants in 5 minutes! It is effective against a broad spectrum of bacteria & viruses. MED 5 Neutral Disinfectant has been formulated to aid in the reduction of cross-contamination on treated surfaces not only in hospitals, but in homes, schools, institutions and industry.

  • Neutral pH, non-staining, non-corrosive to equipment
  • Easy to handle
  • Does not dull floor finishes
  • Dwell time: 5 minutes
  • Cleaner – Bactericide – Virucide – Fungicide – Germicide – Controls Mould & Mildew
  • Approved by Health Canada

 

Appearence Liquid
Colour Green
D.I.N 02470802
Fragrance Citrus
pH 7-8
Solubility Soluble
Viscosity at 25°C 2.024 mm2/s
Dilution Rate   1:64
Manufacture Code INO-MED5-378

entry.title: ServClean - food-contact surface sanitizer (946mL)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CHARLOTTE PRODUCTS
Type: Sanitizer
Price: 12.95

ServClean is designed specifically for food service, food processing plants, dairies, restaurants, bars and institutions where sanitization and deodorization is of prime importance.

  • ServClean is effective at reducing microbial contamination while being both rinse-free and phosphate free.

Product Use:

  • Clean the surface that is to be sanitized.
  • Spray a fine mist of ServClean onto the surface.
  • Allow solution to contact the surface for at least 60 seconds.
  • No rinsing is required.
  • Leave the solution to dry.
Container Type  Bottle
Container Volume 946mL

entry.title: BANO 6 - Disinfectant, Cleaner & Degreaser (4L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: INO SOLUTIONS
Type: disinfectant
Price: 28.96

BANO 6 est un nettoyant, désinfectant et assainissant conçu pour le nettoyage général dans les écoles, hôtels, les bureaux, cuisines, établissements de traitement des aliments et pour l’usage industriel et hospitalier léger. Lorsqu’utilisé tel qu’indiqué, BANO 6 est conçu pour désinfecter les surfaces dures inanimées telles que les murs, planchers, éviers, comptoirs, tables, chaises et téléphones.

  • Tue les organismes suivants : Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella choleraesuis, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli, Salmonella typhosa, Streptococcus faecalis, Shigella dysenteriae, Proteus mirabilis, Aspergillus niger, Trichophyton interdigitale (pied d’athlète).
  • Idéal dans les salles d’urgence, les blocs opératoires, les salles de bain, les chambres de patients, les aires repas/repos, etc.
  • Certifié ACIA pour des applications dans les chaînes de préparations alimentaires et les lieux de préparation des aliments.
  • Excellente alternative pour combattre le COVID-19

Dilution:

  • Parvovirus / Coronavirus: 1:6
  • Désinfection générale 1:20
  • Assainissement 1:60

Colour Green
D.I.N 02288249
Format(s) 4L

entry.title: BIONATURE® Germix - Liquid Disinfectant (800ML)
entry.summary:
Vendor: BIONATURE®
Type: Surface Disinfectant
Price: 8.95

This product is safe for use on food contact surfaces.

GERMIX disinfectant cleaner kill 99.9% of bacteria* in 5 seconds. Useful on all non porous surfaces. Designed to disinfect, eliminate bad odors and remove scuffs such as: dirt, blood, urine, excrement, etc.

GERMIX is a "virucidal broad-spectrum" disinfectant that should inactivate the SARS-CoV-2 virus with a contact time of 5 minutes. No scrubbing is necessary. Allow the surface to air dry or wipe with a dry cloth.

  • Certified non-toxic for the environment.
  • Biodegradable (according to OECD test)
  • Non-carcinogenic
  • No phosphate, no NTA
  • No dyes or fomaldehyde

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE :

If used on a surface that may come in contact with food, rinse surface thoroughly with water after treatment.

This product cannot be used on utensils, dishes or glasses.

  • General cleaning: Spray on soiled areas and wipe clean with a dry cloth.
  • To sanitize and deodorize: For heavily soiled surfaces, pre-cleaning is required. Spray 8 inches apart, covering the entire surface to be treated for 5 seconds and wipe dry.
  • Disinfection: Remove all dirt before applying. Refer to the previous step and leave the surface wet for 5 minutes. No rubbing is necessary. Allow the surface to air dry or wipe with a dry cloth.

entry.title: Oxivir Plus - Concentrated Disinfectant Cleaner (3.78L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: DIVERSEY
Type: disinfectant
Price: 59.89

A one-step disinfectant cleaner based on proprietary Accelerated Hydrogen Peroxide (AHP®) technology to deliver fast, effective cleaning performance. At 1:40 dilution, disinfects in five minutes. Virucide, bactericide, fungicide, and mildewcide. Kills MRSA, Norovirus and Canine parvovirus. Concentrate delivers economical and environmentally safe performance. Meets bloodborne pathogen standards for decontaminating blood and body fluids.

  • Quick disinfection in just 5 minutes against Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV-1) (AIDS Virus), Polio virus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus, Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), Salmonella enterica, Influenza A Virus and VRE
  • No VOCs, no added fragrance and no NPEs
  • 5 minute Bactericidal, Tuberculocidal, Virucidal, Fungicidal with a 30sec 1:128 non food contact sanitizer claim
  • AHP(R) active breaks down into water and oxygen after use
  • Delivers fast and effective cleaning performance while being non-irritating to eyes and skin in use dilution
Colour Colourless
D.I.N 02403684

pH 0.8

entry.title: Med 55 - Spray & Wipe Disinfectant Cleaner (4L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: INO SOLUTIONS
Type: Surface Disinfectant
Price: 29.95

MED 55 Spray & Wipe Disinfectant Cleaner is effective against a wide variety broad-spectrum of microorganisms including bacteria, antibiotic resistant bacteria and viruses. MED 55 removes dirt, grime, blood, urine, fecal matter and other common soils found in animal housing facilities. It also eliminates odors leaving surfaces smelling clean and fresh. It cleans, disinfects and deodorizes hard, non-porous inanimate surfaces in one step. Its non-abrasive formula is designed for use on hard, non-porous inanimate surfaces: plated or stainless steel, aluminum, chrome, glazed porcelain, glazed tile, laminated surfaces associated with floors, walls, countertops, cages, crates, kennels, and animal equipment found in animal housing facilities.

  • Ready to use
  • Dwell time: 5 minutes
  • Effective against a wide variety broad-spectrum of microorganisms including bacteria, antibioticresistant bacteria and viruses
  • It cleans, disinfects and deodorizes hard, non-porous inanimate surfaces in one step
  • Non-abrasive formula
  • Approved by Health Canada
Appearance  Liquid
Format 4L
Colour Blue
D.I.N 02489740
Fragrance Lemon
pH 11-12
Manufacture Code INO-MED55-378
